00018 class IndivSpikeOutputter
00019         : public DataRecordNeuronVisitor
00020 {
00021 protected:
00023     typedef void * InitValue;
00025     IndivSpikeOutputter(InitValue) {}
00026 public:
00028 
00030     unsigned nb_outputs_for_neuron(NeuronInterface * const) {
00031         return 1;
00032     }
00033 
00035 
00041     template <class FileWrapper>
00042     inline void operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop
00043                           , NeuronInterface * const nrn
00044                           , FileWrapper * const file_wrapper) {
00045         // to retrieve the list of the spike times
00046         nrn->apply_visitor(*this);
00047 
00048         if (spike_time_list_pointer() != 0) {
00049             // go through the spike list
00050             for (std::deque<Time>::const_iterator i = spike_time_list().begin();
00051                     i != spike_time_list().end();
00052                     ++i)
00053                 // outputs to file only if the spike time is between t_start and t_stop
00054                 if ((*i >= t_start) && (*i < t_stop))
00055                     file_wrapper->write_to_file(*i);
00056         } else std::cout << "error while outputting spike times: void spikelist";
00057 
00058         // reinitialise the visitor (sets the spike_time_list_pointer to 0)
00059         reset();
00060 
00061         // insert separation between the spike trains
00062         file_wrapper->insert_separation("end_variable");
00063     }
00064 
00065     template <class FileWrapper>
00066     inline void export_connectivity(NeuronInterface * const nrn, FileWrapper * const file_wrapper, int pre_post) {
00067     }
00068 };

00077 class SpikingRateOutputter
00078         : public DataRecordNeuronVisitor
00079 {
00080     template <class KernelFunction> friend class CovarianceOutputter;
00081 protected:
00083     typedef void * InitValue;
00085     SpikingRateOutputter(InitValue) {}
00086 public:
00088 
00090     unsigned nb_outputs_for_neuron(NeuronInterface * const) {
00091         return 1;
00092     }
00093 
00095 
00101     template <class FileWrapper>
00102     inline void operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop
00103                           , NeuronInterface * const nrn
00104                           , FileWrapper * const file_wrapper) {
00105         // to retrieve the list of the spike times
00106         nrn->apply_visitor(*this);
00107 
00108         if (spike_time_list_pointer() != 0)
00109             file_wrapper->write_to_file(compute_rate(t_start, t_stop, spike_time_list().begin(), spike_time_list().end()));
00110         else
00111             std::cout << "error while outputting spike times: void spikelist";
00112 
00113         // reinitialise the visitor (sets the spike_time_list_pointer to 0)
00114         reset();
00115     }
00117 
00123     inline double compute_rate(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop
00124                                , const std::deque<Time>::const_iterator & spike_list_iterator_begin
00125                                , const std::deque<Time>::const_iterator & spike_list_iterator_end) {
00126         // look for the first spike after t_start (iterator i)
00127         std::deque<Time>::const_iterator i = spike_list_iterator_begin;
00128         for (; i != spike_list_iterator_end;
00129                 ++i)
00130             if ((*i) >= t_start) break;
00131         // look for the first spike after t_stop (iterator j)
00132         std::deque<Time>::const_iterator j = i;
00133         for (; j != spike_list_iterator_end;
00134                 ++j)
00135             if ((*j) > t_stop) break;
00136         // returns the result
00137         return ((double)(j - i)) / (t_stop - t_start);
00138     }
00139 
00140     template <class FileWrapper>
00141     inline void export_connectivity(NeuronInterface * const nrn, FileWrapper * const file_wrapper, int pre_post) {
00142     }
00143 
00144 };

00153 template <class KernelFunction>
00154 class CovarianceOutputter
00155 {
00156 protected:
00158     typedef void * InitValue;
00160     CovarianceOutputter(InitValue) : sro_(0) {}
00161 public:
00163 
00165     unsigned nb_outputs_for_pair(NeuronInterface * const, NeuronInterface * const) {
00166         return 1;
00167     }
00168 
00170 
00177     template <class FileWrapper>
00178     inline void operation(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop
00179                           , const std::deque<Time> & spike_list1
00180                           , const std::deque<Time> & spike_list2
00181                           , FileWrapper * const file_wrapper) {
00182         double res = 0.;
00183 
00184         std::deque<Time>::const_iterator i1 = spike_list1.begin();
00185         for (; i1 != spike_list1.end(); ++i1)
00186             if ((*i1) >= t_start) break;
00187         std::deque<Time>::const_iterator i2 = spike_list2.begin();
00188         for (; i2 != spike_list2.end(); ++i2)
00189             if ((*i2) >= t_start) break;
00190         if (i2 == spike_list2.end())
00191             return file_wrapper->write_to_file(res); // no significant spike in spike_list2
00192 
00193         for (; i1 != spike_list1.end(); ++i1) {
00194             if ((*i1) >= t_stop) break;
00195             for (; i2 != spike_list2.begin(); --i2) {
00196                 if (i2 != spike_list2.end())
00197                     if (((*i2) < (*i1) - KernelFunction::cutoff_left) || ((*i2) < t_start)) {
00198                         ++i2;
00199                         break;
00200                     }
00201             }
00202             for (; i2 != spike_list2.end(); ++i2) {
00203                 if (((*i2) < (*i1) + KernelFunction::cutoff_right) && ((*i2) < t_stop))
00204                     res += kf_(*i1, *i2);
00205                 else
00206                     break;
00207             }
00208         }
00209         return file_wrapper->write_to_file(
00210                    res / (t_stop - t_start)
00211                    - KernelFunction::mass
00212                    * sro_.compute_rate(t_start, t_stop, spike_list1.begin(), spike_list1.end())
00213                    * sro_.compute_rate(t_start, t_stop, spike_list2.begin(), spike_list2.end()));
00214     }
00215 
00216 private:
00217     KernelFunction kf_; 
00218     SpikingRateOutputter sro_; 
00219 };
